thread.title: Perfect hotel
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Antonio S
title: Perfect hotel
text:
Perfect hotel. 2 minutes walking from Times Square. Big room. Amenities. Good breakfast. Free snacks and drinks from 5 to 7 pm. Friendly staff. Clean. Perfect location for shopping, restaurants, theaters, etc. Free wifi. Will go back for sure. Good value!
Room Tip: Best location in Manhattan See more room tips
